articles.author: Gerald Imray
articles.title: Trump is bringing white South Africans to the US as refugees, but what persecution are they facing? - AP News
articles.description: The Trump administration is bringing a small number of white South Africans to the United States as refugees next week in what it says is the start of a larger relocation effort. It says the minority Afrikaners are being persecuted by their Black-led governme…
articles.content: CAPE TOWN, South Africa (AP) The Trump administration is bringing a small number of white South Africans to the United States as refugees next week in what it says is the start of a larger relocation… [+5546 chars]
